title: may 1: meet batman
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the first appearance of Batman in Detective Comics. After, she reflects on Elton John’s boundary-breaking tour. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
